Subject: Assistance with Creating AD Report in Netwrix
Description:
Hi Support, 

I’m reaching out because I’d like to create an Active Directory (AD) report that shows the Department and Company fields for all users in the Main Users OU. Ideally, I’d like the report to display the following information for each user:
•First Name
•Last Name
•Department
•Company
Could you please guide me on how to set this up in Netwrix? I’d love to learn how to generate this kind of report myself for future use.

Thank you so much, 
Mawloda
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: Attempt to help build the needed report
What_We_Know__c:
We run on 11.6 and this does not impact the business immediately but its good to have this information for updates, and changes. 

This is a  new report we would need help setting up.
Solution_Comment__c:
Customer replied that they figure out the needed report.

Referenced the following for the SA_ADInventory_UsersView:  
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Administration > Reporting > Creating a Report
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/Report/Create.htm

Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 Administration > Reporting > Report Configuration Wizard
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/Report/Wizard/Overview.htm

Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Administration > Reporting > Report Configuration Wizard > Widgets Page > Grid
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/Report/Wizard/Widgets.htm#grid
